articles.title: Kauai rejoins Hawaii's Safe Travels program for visitors
articles.description: HONOLULU (AP) — The island of Kauai in Hawaii has rejoined the state's Safe Travels program, which means out-of-state visitors can skip quarantining if they test negative for the coronavirus up to 72 hours before their flight.

articles.title: Dr. Amy Acton, who led Ohio's early pandemic response, says she won't run for US Senate
articles.description: COLUMBUS, Ohio (AP) — Dr. Amy Acton, who led Ohio's early pandemic response, says she won't run for US Senate.

articles.title: Former Trump housing official sanctioned over campaign video
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — A former federal official admitted she abused her authority in a publicity stunt that tricked New York City public housing residents into sounding supportive of former President Donald Trump, ethics oversight officials said Tuesday.
